Orange Lantern Ring
Keywords: Orange Lantern Corps
INDESTRUCTIBLE
EQUIP: ANY
UNEQUIP: DROP
EFFECT: Plasticity. If this character can already use Plasticity, when it hits with a close attack, after resolutions you may unequip a hit character and equip that equipment to this character. // POWER: If no Construct generated by this character was on your force this turn, generate a Orange Construct that hasn't been generated by this character this game. // If this character has a listed keyword, this effect is activated as FREE instead.
Light Object
10 Points

January 14, 2023
tidge
Without an errata, or special character rules, the updated (revised for 2022) parts of the Comprehensive Rules (25.2d) indicate that the Orange Ring would be unequipped via the Plasticity/Close Attack usage of the Orange Ring, if you choose to equip another object. For now, it's Larfleeze (and his traited Plasticity, and his traited NOT YOURS!) that can (optionally) accumulate multiple equipment during the game. I don't see that there is a choice to force another character to unequip and NOT also equip that equipment. This is the only part that I think could use a clarification.
January 14, 2023
OutlawFH
When you unequip someone of their equipment you do not auto equip it unless the effect specifically says you can, they just don't have it on them at that point.
